import React from 'react'; import { ThumbUpIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; import { AnnotationIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline'; const Post = ({ _id, title, description, image, user, createdAT, likes, commen}) => (

{user?.username}

{createdAT}

{title}

{description}

comentarios prrones

) export default Post;
